welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mitcham, a charming town known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Mitcham has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves all flights and offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights and is home to many airlines including British Airways and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal was recently rebuilt and serves both domestic and international flights, with airlines such as United and Air Canada operating here.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is used for long-haul flights, with airlines like Virgin Atlantic and Emirates operating here.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves mostly long-haul flights, with airlines such as Qatar Airways and Etihad Airways operating here.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal is the largest and newest at Heathrow, serving both domestic and international flights, with British Airways being the main airline operating here.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a premium option for faster speeds.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Gatwick Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport provides a luxurious and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to the needs of VIP and private jet passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Blackbushe Airport caters to VIP and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
